author: kfogel
msg: Fix issue #598.
Patch by: Joseph Dane <jdane@studio3511.com>
* status.c (svn_cl__print_status_list): Display a meaningful message
when calling 'status' on a non-existent (as opposed to simply
non-VC'd) file.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h (enum svn_wc_status_kind): Move
svn_wc_status_unversioned up to be near svn_wc_status_none, make
comments terser.  (This was not part of Joseph Dane's original change,
I added it while I was in the neighborhood. -kff)

author: sussman
msg: New EOL logic for 'svn revert'.
* adm_ops.c (revert_admin_things): before copying text-base out to
overwrite the working, check the eol-style property.  If 'native',
call copy_and_translate to native eol style.

author: kfogel
msg: Working with Ben on eol conversion, part of issue #524:
* subversion/libsvn_wc/questions.c (svn_wc_text_modified_p): Rewrite
to handle various newline styles.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc.h (enum svn_wc__eol_style): New style
svn_wc__eol_style_unknown; remove trailing comma from last style
entry.  Doc fix.
(SVN_WC__DEFAULT_EOL_MARKER): New #define.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c (svn_wc__eol_style_from_value): Use
svn_wc__eol_style_unknown for unrecognized value.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h (svn_io_copy_and_translate): Doc
tweaks.
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h (SVN_ERRDEF): New error
SVN_ERR_IO_UNKNOWN_EOL.  Reword SVN_ERR_IO_INCONSISTENT_EOL.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c (do_postfix_text_deltas):
Separate native and fixed eol style cases when committing.

author: gstein
msg: Convert the wcprop get/set functions to use sane types (i.e. not stringbuf)
* svn_wc.h (svn_wc_get_wc_prop, svn_wc_set_wc_prop): change param types
* svn_ra.h (svn_ra_get_wc_prop_func_t, svn_ra_set_wc_prop_func_t):
change param types
* libsvn_wc/wc.h (svn_wc__wcprop_get, svn_wc__wcprop_set): change param
types
* libsvn_wc/props.c (wcprop_list): change path argument to "const char *".
switch over to use SVN_ERR() rather than if/return logic
(svn_wc__wcprop_get, svn_wc__wcprop_set): update to the new param types
* libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c (svn_wc_get_wc_prop, svn_wc_set_wc_prop): switch
functions over to use the new param types. simplify baton assignment.
* libsvn_wc/get_editor.c (change_dir_prop): if the prop is a wcprop, then
call svn_wc__wcprop_set() using the new param types
(close_file): when dumping stored wcprops, call svn_wc__wcprop_set with
the new param types
* libsvn_ra_dav/merge.c (merge_ctx_t {}): remove vsn_url_name field (a
stringbuf) since we can use a simple string constant now.
(bump_resource): change vsn_url_str to be an svn_string_t instead and
adjust things to call the set_prop callback appropriately
(svn_ra_dav__merge_activity): don't init the vsn_url_name field any more
* libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h (svn_ra_dav__get_activity_url): the returned value
is not a "const svn_string_t *" instead of a stringbuf
* libsvn_ra_dav/commit.c (commit_ctx_t {}): remove the vsn_url_name field
(a stringbuf) since we can set the prop using a string constant now.
(get_version_url): change logic to use new get_func param types
(get_activity_url): return the activity_url as an svn_string_t instead.
change logic to call get_func with its new types now.
(create_activity): change the activity_url type which is passed to
get_activity_url() (which changed the param type). adjust construction
of the final activity URL to compensate for the type change.
(svn_ra_dav__get_commit_editor): no longer set the vsn_url_name field
* libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (begin_checkout): return the activity_url as an
svn_string_t type
(svn_ra_dav__do_checkout): handle the type change of the activity_url
* libsvn_ra_dav/options.c (options_ctx_t {}): change the activity_url
field over to an svn_string_t.
(end_element): initialize cc->activity_url as an svn_string_t now
(svn_ra_dav__get_activity_url): change the type of the activity_url param

author: gstein
msg: Fix the creator-displayname and creationdate properties
* (dav_svn_insert_prop): if the property isn't defined, then return NOTDEF
to let mod_dav handle the undefined property appropriately.
